ComicInfo.Title: Dire Things (Part 2)
ComicInfo.Summary: Dire Things (Part 2): Praelyx goes to the Dark King and makes a deal. She then returns from the underworld to find Bairn and kill him, dragging with her the Reavers of Nihilon.
